mapper.select: select id, product_id, seckill_price, stock_count, time, intergral, start_date from t_seckill_product where to_days(start_date) = to_days(now()) and time = #{time};
mapper.update: update t_seckill_product set stock_count = stock_count - 1 where id = #{seckillId} and stock_count>0
mapper.select: select stock_count from t_seckill_product where id = #{seckillId}
